description: A toggle component for selecting one value from a range of options. This is equivalent to a radio button group. It can be styled as a Toggle or as Radio buttons.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the radio button group.

props.name: value
props.description: The key of the selected option.

props.name: model
props.description: The list of options to present to the user. See NeonToggleModel.

props.name: toggleStyle
props.description: The style of toggle to display to the user. See NeonToggleStyle.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the toggle. See NeonSize.

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the toggle if the style is a radio button group. See NeonOrientation.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the toggle. See NeonFunctionalColor.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether or not the toggle is disabled.

events.name: input
events.description: Event triggered when the selected value changes.
